entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
